Adolf Hitler was a German politician who served as leader of the Nazi Party, Chancellor of the Reich and FÃ¼hrer of Nazi Germany from 1934 to 1945. As dictator of the German Reich, he was the main instigator of World War II and a central figure in the Holocaust.
